name: Project Spark (itch)
description:
A fantasy god game with elements of RTS, sandbox games and sim games. It is based around managing your followers while trying to defeat other AI or multiplayer deities, whether by influencing or ordering your followers to attack them, converting followers in order to grow in power or using your powers.

The game is still in development and you can try out our free demo. Our few quests and interactive environment including very beautiful level design will show you what the game will offer you.

Control Scheme 

Everything is controlled using the pointer with description of powers that you can use in in-game menu.
